item.title: Debbie add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Dorothea Tanning
item.description: "Art has always been the raft onto which we climb to save our sanity. I don't see a different purpose for it now." -- Dorothea Tanning

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Debbie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!" -- Audrey Hepburn
